topic.title: Updating the Conga Orchestrate Logo in Lightning

ol.li: Search for "Conga Orchestrate Logo" in the master search bar and click the record that is found.
In the top menu, click Download to download the logo to your computer.
Under the Platform Tools section of the Setup menu, click Apps to expand the list of options and then click App Manager.
Locate both records of Conga Orchestrate. One record is for the Lightning App and the other is for the Classic App. Repeat the steps below for both Apps.
Click the dropdown arrow for the Conga Orchestrate record and select Edit.
Under the Image, click the small blue Clear button.
Click Upload and select the recently download Conga Orchestrate Logo.
